page.title: 01Summary of the Area
page.content: The area is mainly a green belt area between the town of St Helens and the new town of Skelmersdale. There are two very small residential areas, Bickerstaffe and Barrow Nook and one which is slightly larger Rainford Junction. In close proximity to Rainford Junction is Rainford Village where most of the local facilities can be found. Rainford Village does not come into our area. The area is well situated with regard to the road network system being only minutes from the East Lancashire road, M58, and the M6. The area is also split by a dual carriageway-the Rainford by pass-which forms a direct link between the M58 and the East Lancashire Road.
